name: Lazy. (Low Effort Jam 7)
description:
So basically I made this thing for the Low Effort 7 jam because I'm bored and have no motivation for real projects.

Ya throw the ball to kill evil triangles. Thats it. Its bouncy.

3 amazingly well-designed levels. 2/4 level designers approve.

Thank you to Underwander for co-voice acting

Thank you to Jaloson for the yellow ball idea.

even this page is lazy, I hate making game pages yknow
